column2:
"...The true purpose of a 《Phantom》?
Don't ask questions when you're not ready to hear the answers. You might live to regret it. Heheheh..."

"Hmph, you again.
...I doubt we'll have anything to say to one another.
I am a shadow. The light has no hold over me."

"Come what may, I stand alone.
...You have your own path to follow."
"Received \"Grinder\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Photon Sphere\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Excube\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Lambda Grinder\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Tri-Boost +50％\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Great Success Grind Rate +50%\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Lambda Grinder x3\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Ability Success Rate +30%\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"Tri-Boost +100％\" from Kyokuya."
"Received \"<%skit_text>\" from Kyokuya."
"...Ah, yes... I have something for you."
"...Don't go getting the wrong idea, now."
"I'm giving this to you so that you'll go away and stop bothering me. Nothing more."
"...Are we clear? Now, get out of here."

"Hmph, you again.
...I doubt we'll have anything to say to one another.
I am a shadow. The light has no hold over me."

"Come what may, I stand alone.
...You have your own path to follow."

"影はいつでも背後に潜み
そして終焉を与えるのみ……"

"やつらにも、そしてお前にも。
影の恐ろしさを、見せてやろう。
昏き恐怖におびえるがいい……"

"喜び、か。
俺には……この《亡霊》には
そんな感情は不要だ。"

"せいぜい浮かれるがいい。
お前たちは、己の正義を振りかざし
敵に立ち向かうのだろう。"

"《亡霊》は《亡霊》らしく
影に潜み、目的の為に動く。
……そう、どんな手段を使ってもな。"

"...You again.
Someone who wishes to become my disciple, you say?"

"I have only one answer for such a fool...
\"Give up\"."

"The path of the Phantom is a dark road to walk. No-one will light the way for you...
I myself faced certain death, and it was my own power that brought me back from the edge."
"...However... If they are prepared to sacrifice everything to dedicate themselves to the way of the Phantom... Tell them this."
"Don't ask other people how to accomplish your goals. If you can't do it alone, you don't deserve to succeed."

"……ふん、騒々しい。
目的を果たしてもいないうちから
一喜一憂してどうする。"

"鼓舞も感傷も不要。
《亡霊》はただ、目的の為に動くのみ。"
